```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)

```

```{r Read in Data}
#Dataset from https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/osmi/mental-health-in-tech-survey?resource=download

survey <- read_csv(here::here("survey.csv"))

head(survey)
```

```{r clean}

clean_data <- survey %>%
  mutate(Gender = ifelse(Gender == "M" | Gender == "m" | Gender == "male", "Male",
                  ifelse(Gender == "guy" | Gender == "Guy", "Male",
                  ifelse(Gender == "F" | Gender == "f" | Gender == "female", "Female", Gender))))



saveRDS(clean_data, file = "clean_data.RDS")
```
